languages.text: {n}Кибелла внимательно, очень внимательно смотрит на вас. Ее бровь изгибается в мучительном раздумье.{/n} "Ты... прав{mf||а}. Хищники идут к цели. Всегда". {n}Она усмехается.{/n} "Висирь едва ли бы одобрил, что я отступила от заветов... но Висирь не знал тех испытаний, что выпали мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Кибелла внимательно, очень внимательно смотрит на вас. Ее бровь изгибается в мучительном раздумье.{/n} "Ты... прав{mf||а}. Хищники идут к цели. Всегда". {n}Она усмехается.{/n} "Висирь едва ли бы одобрил, что я отступила от заветов... но Висирь не знал тех испытаний, что выпали мне".

languages.text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow tenses in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their prey. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring the Tenets... but he also never had to face the kinds of trials that I have."

Всегда". {n}Она усмехается.{/n} "Висирь едва ли бы одобрил, что я отступила от заветов... но Висирь не знал тех испытаний, что выпали мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow arches in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their goal. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring his tenets... but the Vizsier never went through the kind of trials I've had to face."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah richtet ihre gesamte Aufmerksamkeit auf dich. Sie runzelt angestrengt die Stirn, als würde sie verzweifelt mit sich ringen.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Raubtiere hören niemals auf, ihre Beute zu jagen. Niemals." {n}Sie verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der Wesir hätte es wohl kaum gutgeheißen, dass ich die Grundsätze ignoriere ... aber er musste sich auch nie solchen Prüfungen stellen wie ich."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow tenses in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their prey. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring the Tenets... but he also never had to face the kinds of trials that I have."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah richtet ihre gesamte Aufmerksamkeit auf dich. Sie runzelt angestrengt die Stirn, als würde sie verzweifelt mit sich ringen.{/n} "Ihr habt recht. Raubtiere hören niemals auf, ihre Beute zu jagen. Niemals." {n}Sie verzieht das Gesicht.{/n} "Der Wesir hätte es wohl kaum gutgeheißen, dass ich die Grundsätze ignoriere ... aber er musste sich auch nie solchen Prüfungen stellen wie ich."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah centra toda su atención en ti. Su ceño se tensa en una lucha desesperada.{/n} «Tiene razón. Los depredadores nunca dejan de perseguir a su presa. Nunca». {n}Sonríe.{/n} «El Visir no habría aprobado que ignorara la Doctrina... pero tampoco ha tenido que enfrentarse a las pruebas que he afrontado yo».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow tenses in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their prey. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring the Tenets... but he also never had to face the kinds of trials that I have."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah centra toda su atención en ti. Su ceño se tensa en una lucha desesperada.{/n} «Tiene razón. Los depredadores nunca dejan de perseguir a su presa. Nunca». {n}Sonríe.{/n} «El Visir no habría aprobado que ignorara la Doctrina... pero tampoco ha tenido que enfrentarse a las pruebas que he afrontado yo».

languages.text: {n}キベラがあなたに全神経を集中させている。彼女は何か必死にもがいているかのように、眉根を強く寄せている。{/n}「あなたが正しいわ。捕食者は決して獲物を追うのをやめない。絶対に」{n}彼女がせせら笑う。{/n}「ヴィジールは私が教義を無視することをきっと認めない…けれど彼もまた、私の試練に似たような物に直面したことはなかった」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow tenses in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their prey. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring the Tenets... but he also never had to face the kinds of trials that I have."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラがあなたに全神経を集中させている。彼女は何か必死にもがいているかのように、眉根を強く寄せている。{/n}「あなたが正しいわ。捕食者は決して獲物を追うのをやめない。絶対に」{n}彼女がせせら笑う。{/n}「ヴィジールは私が教義を無視することをきっと認めない…けれど彼もまた、私の試練に似たような物に直面したことはなかった」

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈把所有注意力都集中在你身上，眉头紧皱，仿佛在拼命挣扎一样。{/n}“你说得没错，掠食者永远不会停止追捕猎物，永远不会。”{n}她笑了起来。{/n}“我违背了教义，宿老恐怕不会赞成我的做法……但他也从来没经历过我所经历的种种试炼。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow tenses in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their prey. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring the Tenets... but he also never had to face the kinds of trials that I have."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈把所有注意力都集中在你身上，眉头紧皱，仿佛在拼命挣扎一样。{/n}“你说得没错，掠食者永远不会停止追捕猎物，永远不会。”{n}她笑了起来。{/n}“我违背了教义，宿老恐怕不会赞成我的做法……但他也从来没经历过我所经历的种种试炼。”

languages.text: {n}Kibellah concentre toute son attention sur vous. Ses sourcils, en proie à quelque lutte intérieure, semblent pour le moins crispés.{/n} « Vous avez raison. Les prédateurs ne cessent jamais de traquer leur proie. Jamais. » {n}Elle affiche un sourire narquois.{/n} « Le vizir n'apprécierait guère que j'ignore des préceptes... mais il faut dire qu'il n'a jamais eu à affronter les épreuves que j'ai vécues. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow tenses in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their prey. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring the Tenets... but he also never had to face the kinds of trials that I have."

Les prédateurs ne cessent jamais de traquer leur proie. Jamais. » {n}Elle affiche un sourire narquois.{/n} « Le vizir n'apprécierait guère que j'ignore des préceptes... mais il faut dire qu'il n'a jamais eu à affronter les épreuves que j'ai vécues. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah, tüm dikkatini sana yöneltiyor. Beyhude yere mücadele ederken kaşları geriliyor.{/n} "Haklısın. Yırtıcılar, avlarını kovalamaya asla son vermez. Asla..." {n}Gülümsüyor.{/n} "Vezir, İlkeleri yok saymamı o kadar da kolay kabul etmezdi... Gerçi o, benim yüzleştiğim türden imtihanlarla da hiç yüzleşmedi."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah focuses all her attention on you. Her eyebrow tenses in some desperate struggle.{/n} "You are right. Predators never stop chasing their prey. Never." {n}She smirks.{/n} "The Vizsier hardly would have approved of me ignoring the Tenets... but he also never had to face the kinds of trials that I have."
